scripts.prisma:pull: ls schemas/*.prisma | while read -r schema; do pnpx prisma db pull --schema=$schema; done
scripts.dev: ls schemas/*.prisma | while read -r schema; do pnpx prisma generate --schema=$schema & done
scripts.build: ls schemas/*.prisma | while read -r schema; do pnpx prisma generate --schema=$schema; done && rm -rf dist && ./node_modules/.pnpm/node_modules/.bin/tsc
